tasks.title: Project Setup and File Organization
tasks.description: Separate monolithic assets file into individual focused documents and establish project structure
tasks.details: Successfully separated website_project_assets_and_templates.md into individual files: pitch-email.md, contract-skeleton.md, quote-breakdown.md, intake-questionnaire.md, google-form-fields.md, and ai-prompts.md. Created memory bank structure with core documentation files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all files are properly separated and contain correct content. Check that memory bank files are complete and follow established patterns.

tasks.title: Memory Bank Initialization
tasks.description: Initialize comprehensive memory bank with project documentation and context
tasks.details: Created core memory bank files: projectbrief.md, productContext.md, systemPatterns.md, techContext.md, activeContext.md, and progress.md. Established documentation hierarchy and project intelligence system.
tasks.testStrategy: Review all memory bank files for completeness and accuracy. Ensure they provide comprehensive project context.

tasks.title: Taskmaster Integration Setup
tasks.description: Initialize Taskmaster project management system and create initial task structure
tasks.details: Initialized Taskmaster with Cursor rules profile. Created PRD document and established task management structure. Set up project root and configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Taskmaster is properly initialized and can manage tasks. Test task creation and status updates.

tasks.title: Current HTML Code Review
tasks.description: Analyze existing portfolio website HTML code to identify strengths, weaknesses, and improvement opportunities
tasks.details: Review portfolio_website_index.html for code quality, performance, accessibility, and user experience. Identify specific areas for improvement and document findings.
tasks.testStrategy: Test HTML in multiple browsers and devices. Check for accessibility issues, performance problems, and responsive design issues.

tasks.title: Content Audit and Placeholder Replacement
tasks.description: Identify and replace all placeholder content with real portfolio information and professional copy
tasks.details: Replace placeholder text, images, and contact information with real content. Update business name, services descriptions, portfolio examples, and contact details.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all placeholder content has been replaced. Check that all text is professional and accurate. Ensure contact information is correct.

tasks.title: Google Forms Integration Setup
tasks.description: Create and configure Google Forms for order inquiries and integrate with the website
tasks.details: Create Google Forms based on intake questionnaire. Configure form fields for business info, project requirements, budget, and contact details. Update website with actual form URLs.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form submission process. Verify all form fields work correctly and submissions are received. Test form validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Portfolio Images and Media Optimization
tasks.description: Gather, optimize, and integrate high-quality portfolio images and media assets
tasks.details: Replace Unsplash placeholder images with real portfolio work. Optimize images for web performance. Ensure responsive image loading and proper alt text.
tasks.testStrategy: Test image loading performance. Verify images display correctly on all devices. Check alt text for accessibility.

tasks.title: Mobile Responsiveness Enhancement
tasks.description: Ensure perfect mobile experience across all device sizes and orientations
tasks.details: Test and improve mobile responsiveness. Optimize touch interactions, navigation, and content layout for mobile devices. Ensure forms work well on mobile.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on various mobile devices and screen sizes. Check touch interactions, scrolling, and form usability on mobile.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize website performance for fast loading times and smooth user experience
tasks.details: Optimize CSS, JavaScript, and images for performance. Implement lazy loading, minification, and other performance best practices. Target < 3 second load time.
tasks.testStrategy: Use performance testing tools to measure load times. Test on various connection speeds and devices.

tasks.title: SEO and Accessibility Improvements
tasks.description: Implement SEO best practices and ensure accessibility compliance
tasks.details: Add proper meta tags, structured data, and semantic HTML. Implement accessibility features like proper heading hierarchy, alt text, and keyboard navigation.
tasks.testStrategy: Use SEO and accessibility testing tools. Verify compliance with WCAG guidelines and search engine requirements.

tasks.title: Analytics and Tracking Setup
tasks.description: Implement Google Analytics and conversion tracking for monitoring website performance
tasks.details: Set up Google Analytics tracking. Implement conversion tracking for form submissions. Add event tracking for user interactions and engagement metrics.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify analytics tracking is working correctly. Test conversion tracking and event monitoring.

tasks.title: Cross-Browser Testing and Compatibility
tasks.description: Test website functionality across different browsers and ensure compatibility
tasks.details: Test website in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Ensure all features work correctly across browsers. Fix any compatibility issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Test all functionality in each browser. Verify consistent appearance and behavior across platforms.

tasks.title: GitHub Pages Deployment Setup
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Pages deployment and set up automatic deployment workflow
tasks.details: Set up GitHub repository and configure GitHub Pages hosting. Implement automatic deployment from main branch. Configure custom domain if needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Test deployment process. Verify website is accessible and functions correctly on GitHub Pages.

tasks.title: Documentation and Handoff Preparation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for maintenance and future updates
tasks.details: Create maintenance documentation, update guides, and handoff materials. Document all customizations and configurations for future reference.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and accuracy. Ensure it's understandable for non-technical users.

tasks.title: Final Testing and Launch
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive final testing and launch the website
tasks.details: Perform final comprehensive testing of all features and functionality. Launch website and monitor for any issues. Prepare for client handoff.
tasks.testStrategy: Complete end-to-end testing of all user flows. Verify all features work as expected in production environment.
